Original:

Original:
原本舊店是賣精釀啤酒，但不知什麼原因它關門了，老闆在因緣巧合之下決定把他頂下來，我問老闆：「你怎麼會想開這間酒吧？」他回答道：「我只是想找件事做，剛好這裡關了，那我就來把他重開。」雖然是這樣講，但這邊完全不走精釀啤酒，而只提供一般經典調酒、紅白酒和一些美式食物，主打小資族和想要和朋友輕鬆喝的朋友，來這邊和老闆聊天做朋友，我這天點了一個牛肉漢堡搭套餐，配上經典調酒，總共只花費了420元。在台北這種大都市中，大家都走質感路線，很多酒吧不管裝潢、酒款或是穿搭都走向很不一樣的世界，相對起來，這種家庭酒吧就完全不一樣，給人溫馨、人情味濃厚的感覺。就像黑白切與熱炒店，甚至是老先生老太太的存在，他們雖然看起來不起眼，但是背後卻藏有很多的故事與溫暖，等待著有緣人來陪伴。

歡迎追蹤IG: @alcoholneal 來認識更多酒吧

Originally the old shop was selling craft beer, but for some reason, it was closed. I asked the owner: "Why do you want to open this bar?" He replied: "I just want to find something to do.” Although it sounds like it's just a common thing, here became a new place. Only provide classic cocktails, wines, and some American food. the main customers are petty bourgeoisie and friends who want to drink with friends easily. I ordered a beef burger set on this day, accompanied by a cocktail, it only cost NT$420. In a metropolis such as Taipei, everyone takes a texture route. Many bars go to a very different world regardless of decoration, wine, or dress. Compared to this, the family bar is completely different, giving people a warm and human touch. Like old gentlemen and old ladies, although they seem inconspicuous, they have a lot of stories and warmth behind them, waiting for someone to accompany them

Originally the old shop was selling craft beer, but for some reason, it was closed. The boss decided to push him down because of coincidence. I asked the boss: "Why do you want to open this wine?" A strong feeling.Just like black and white cutting and hot stir -fry shops, and even the existence of old ladies and old ladies, although they look inconspicuous, there are many stories and warmth hidden behind them behind them, waiting for people to accompany them.

Original:
調酒非常優秀，價格雖然稍高但值得。
炸物拼盤的雞柳條很多汁，蠻推薦大家點點看。

個人最喜歡的是他們家的諾曼第冰茶，是有多種酒類的一杯調酒，濃度偏高要注意。
比較特別的是他有加生命之水在裡面，比較少見的調酒類型。

另外除了一般常見的長島冰茶，該店也有長灘冰茶與東京冰茶，在酒類跟調味上有做出不同的分別。

性感海灘、龍舌蘭日出等調酒也相當出色，算是還沒遇過雷酒的一間店。

老闆跟服務人員也相當親切，真的要說就是店面稍小囉。

很推薦大家可以試試看他們家的調酒跟炸物（尤其雞柳條），不會失望的！
EN:
The bartender is very good, although the price is slightly higher, it is worth it.
There are many juice of the chicken willow strips of the fried picker. I recommend everyone to see it.

Personally, the most favorite is the Norman ice tea. It is a glass of bartending with a variety of wines. Pay attention to the high concentration.
It is more special that he has a rare type of bartending in the water that adds life.

In addition, in addition to the common Long Island ice tea, the store also has long beach ice tea and Tokyo ice tea. There is a different difference between alcohol and seasoning.

Sexy beaches, lined sunrise and other bartender are also quite good.

The boss and the service staff are also quite kind. I really want to say that the store is slightly smaller.

It is recommended that you can try their sake and fried objects (especially chicken wicker), which will not be disappointed!
